mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, id, name, type, pw, phone, sid, regdate, like_area, truck_num, truck_name, truck_food, truck_info, truck_doc, truck_area, truck_img) VALUES (user_id_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, 'truck', #{pw}, #{phone}, #{sid}, sysdate, #{likeArea}, #{truckNum}, #{truckName}, #{truckFood}, #{truckInfo}, 'x', #{truckArea}, #{truckImg})
